personal.name: Anthony Limiero
personal.summary: Aerospace engineer with 2 years experience as a mechanical engineer designing avionics hardware and test fixturing using SolidWorks, owning projects from requirements to design to manufacturing to assembly and testing.
personal.details: U.S. citizen eligible for security clearance seeking full time employment starting January 2026.

entries.company: Georgia Tech Christian Campus Fellowship - Associate Campus Minister
bullets: Managed a team of 3 interns and oversaw the ministry for all incoming freshmen
Demonstrated strong communication skills through public speaking and small group facilitation
Led and planned community service trips to foster leadership and community building
Gained conversational Spanish while serving for 5 months in Santiago, Chile

entries.company: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory - Software Computing System Intern
bullets: Created auto-coding tool to generate C++ command validation code for Mars Sample Return mission

entries.company: NASA Goddard Space Flight Center - In-Space Assembly Intern
bullets: Developed concepts for robotically-assembled spacecraft harnessing by interviewing subject matter experts
Illustrated/animated assembly CONOPS in CAD and Blender and presented findings to senior engineers

entries.company: Georgia Tech Research Institute (GTRI) - Mech Engineering Student Co-op
bullets: Re-engineered and qualified legacy avionics components for the US Air Force C-5 Galaxy cargo plane
Designed and manufactured fixturing for verification of mechanical requirements, including vibration testing
Generated part/assembly drawings and analyzed tolerance stackups with GD&T principles as per ASME Y14.5
Performed structural analysis (FEA) on servo body in SolidWorks to evaluate performance under operational loads
Managed design files using SolidWorks PDM to maintain configuration integrity
Presented BOM's, assembly drawings, and test procedures/results at project stage-gate meetings (PDR, CDR)
Collaborated with machinists and senior engineers to integrate design for manufacturing principles into designs
Served as project lead and flight software team lead on cross-disciplinary team of engineers
Managed schedule, conducted design reviews, created test procedures, and coordinated requirements with JAXA
Developed satellite hardware and software for two multidisciplinary 1U CubeSat missions with 1 year timelines
Applied analysis and test methods including RF, vibration, and TVAC testing, plus clean room integration
Developed embedded software in C/C++ and python for power system, radio, and ground support equipment

entries.title: Submersible ROV
entries.description: Created ROV to explore underwater caves with Raspberry Pi, custom PCB, & 3D printing

entries.title: Space Life Detection Instrument
entries.description: Prototyped instrument for in-situ water measurements on icy moons

entries.title: Custom 3D Printer
entries.description: Designed a direct-drive 3D printer with custom manufactured parts

entries.title: Mars Mission Proposal
entries.description: Senior design project modeling lander/orbiter in SolidWorks for seismic research

entries.title: MATLAB Jet Engine Design Tool
entries.description: Modeled/simulated thermodynamic states of ramjets, turbofans, & turbojets

entries.title: Personal Finance Web App
entries.description: Full stack web app using Python and JavaScript hosted on Linux virtual machine

entries.title: Self-Published Novels
entries.description: Co-wrote 2 young adult time-travel fantasy novels in the Son of Time Chronicles

entries.title: 300 Mile Unicycle Ride Fundraiser
entries.description: Raised $3000 in 10 days for community leaders in impoverished south Asia

entries.title: La Amistad
entries.description: Organized GT students to help weekly tutor elementary kids from non-english speaking homes

entries.title: Appalachia Service Project
entries.description: Led two student trips to rural Appalachia to repair homes for families in poverty

entries.title: Casas Por Cristo
entries.description: Built three houses over three years for families in severe poverty in Juarez, Mexico

entries.title: Exchange Intern CMFI
entries.description: Volunteering/teaching English at a college community in Santiago, Chile for 5 months
